code: @Override public String deserialize(final byte[] bytes) throws IOException {     isExceptionThrown.trigger().     throw new RuntimeException(EXCEPTION_MESSAGE). }
@Override public boolean isEndOfStream(final String s) {     return false. }
private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream in) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {     in.defaultReadObject().     this.isExceptionThrown = new OneShotLatch(). }
